articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: South Africa reports second mpox death this week - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: More than 97,000 cases and 186 deaths were reported across 117 countries in the first four months of 2024.
articles.content:
A second person has died in South Africa this week from the viral infection mpox, says the health ministry, less than 24 hours after it announced the first death.
Previously known as monkeypox, mpox… [+2200 chars]
